name: Carrot Revenge (itch)
description:
You are RABBIT, a lonely survivor from an alien abduction, you don't know where you are, or why.

After waking up, you realize you aren't home, and that escaping is not an option.

Features:

• In this bullet-hell journey, encounter more than 10 types of enemies (and more than a hundred of them).

• Each map has a final boss, which has different mechanics, learn and try again.

• With each chest you have an option to maximize your success, choose according to your run preference!

• Over 10 Types of Upgrades, choose wisely or get lucky!

THINGS THAT ARE STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT FOR FULL RELEASE:

FULL SFX - MAIN MENU AND GAME

CONTROL INPUT CHANGER - USE YOUR OWN KEYS

PLAYER ANIMATIONS - BETTER INPUT AND HANDLING

DIFFICULTY BALANCING - UPGRADES AND ENEMIES

ARCADE MODE - Mode where the player can survive through infinite waves, not necessarily needing to be in story mode.

This release is basically the full game, there are still bugs which are being worked on and not found ones, if you experience any glitch in the game, please send it to my e-mail/twitter or post it in this page, I will work on that.

This game was created by a single dev (me) since July 2022, I spent many hours in this project, created all the arts, scripts and everything used in this game, with the exception of  SFX (still working on that).

I'm trying to become a full time game dev, right now I have a part-time job (20 hours week) and work on my games for another 45 hours, my goal is to be able to work only in game development so if you can make a donation I would be extremely thankful.
